mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report_task (task_type, biz_key, payload_json, status, retry_count, next_retry_time, last_error, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{taskType}, #{bizKey}, CAST(#{payloadJson} AS JSON), #{status}, #{retryCount}, #{nextRetryTime}, #{lastError}, NOW(3), NOW(3)) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE updated_at = NOW(3)
mapper.select: SELECT id, task_type, biz_key, JSON_PRETTY(payload_json) AS payload_json, status, retry_count, next_retry_time, last_error FROM report_task WHERE task_type = #{taskType} AND status IN ('PENDING', 'FAILED') AND (next_retry_time IS NULL OR next_retry_time <= #{now}) ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT #{limit}
mapper.update: UPDATE report_task SET status = 'RUNNING', updated_at = NOW(3) WHERE id = #{id} AND status IN ('PENDING', 'FAILED')
UPDATE report_task SET status = 'SUCCESS', updated_at = NOW(3) WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE report_task SET status = 'FAILED', retry_count = #{retryCount}, next_retry_time = #{nextRetryTime}, last_error = #{lastError}, updated_at = NOW(3) WHERE id = #{id}
